categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A war took place between the planet Dornea and the Galactic Empire during the larger Galactic Civil War between the Empire and Rebel Alliance. The war lasted for several years, with the Dornean Navy—using a number of small capital ships including the Braha'tok-class gunships—holding back the much larger Imperial Navy until at least 4 ABY. In 4 ABY, the Dornean Navy lent the Rebel Alliance two Braha'tok-class gunships for the Battle of Endor.
